title: Disabling new champions in draft pick
body: I don't get why Riot allow new champs to be added into draft pick the second they get released. The champ is either 100% banned because people are toxic they don't have said champ, or the champ gets picked before someone picks it, resulting in dodge after dodge after dodge.

replies.body:
I wanna know if he will be disabled in clash.
It'd be laughable if people had to waste a tactical ban on a new champ the day he comes out, in a competition environment.

money. people want to play the champ cause its usually busted and people dont know how to vs it. also some people only play draft pick so they would get punished. also if someone on the enemy team has to ban it then they effectively have 4 bans not 5 so the guy that wants to play new champ wont get to play him but he will win more games. also money. i cant stress how much riot care about money.
